Welcome to the Boutique Chalet Hotel Beau-Site
Spend an unforgettable holiday in our Chalet-Hotel in the midst of the Bernese Alps.

Welcome to the Hotel Beau-Site! We're looking forward to getting to know you personally. Until then, you're welcome to inform yourself about our hotel and the Adelboden Region here. In case you need more information, we're pleased to advise you by phone at +41 (0)33 673 88 88. We're a highly motivated team willing to provide you with everything to make your stay unforgettable. So, see you soon in Adelboden! - Your Beau-Site Team

trans-unit.source: We're crafting new deals for you to enjoy!

Set off on two wheels and you are quickly heading for a completely new mountain experience. Experienced professionals, practice areas, and rental equipment are available to ensure you get the best possible start. Mountain bikers and seasoned cyclists have long been riding the challenging trails and long leisurely distances in the great outdoors.

Where better to broaden your horizons than in the Bernese Alps? The view sweeps serenely over peaks and gorges, and the longing to take big steps into the unknown increases.Planned hikes are also an option as there is no shortage of longer tours and places to stay along your chosen route.
During the summer holidays open daily from 11 a.m.to 4 p.m.!

Swing through the air like Tarzan, let your adrenaline rush when abseiling from a bridge, glide over the river at top speed on a cable car and, last but not least, dare a huge pendulum swing? This is what awaits you in the Adventure Park - Adelboden.
If you like action, explore the impressive alpine world with a scooter.The mile - long, varied routes are waiting to be discovered.
Paragliding in all its facets.We offer you a wide range of airy experiences, from simple adventure flights to full - day paragliding adventures.

Legendary architecture with panoramic views.Under the alpine sun, the water of the 50 - metre Gruebi pool glistens seductively.On the other hand, when the sky is grey, a trip to indoor swimming pools at the Sportzentrum in Frutigen is a great alternative.

A warm welcome to our little paradise in the midst of the Kandertal mountains.The Blausee brand stands for uniqueness from start to finish.Hospitality is part of our mission so you can indulge all your senses with us.The Blausee is considered a place of power - one where you can relax and enjoy nature at its best.

concentration, a head for heights and physical strength are all needed when you are moving in a vertical direction.However, the right equipment is just as crucial for visitors when climbing.Fortunately, the mountain guides and climbing supervisors at Adelboden - Lenk - Kandersteg have well - padded mats, deeply anchored hooks and tightly stretched ropes to hand.This allows you to practise manoeuvres and enjoy views that would otherwise only be possible for expert climbers on high alpine tours.

Adelboden - Lenk has earned its reputation as a top ski resort over many decades.Events like the Ski World Cup at Chuenisbärgli or the professional services offered by the snowsports schools are now well - respected winter institutions.But alpine winter traditions are lived very much in the present.Specialist teams prepare the various slopes with great care each day

"The joy is in having the time to forget time..." ... and limitless freedom to enjoy under the professional supervision of our sports instructors.It's a fantastic feeling making those first tracks in deep, freshly fallen snow. Experience a pure, natural world far from the heavy traffic on the piste and in no time the stresses of everyday life will seem miles away. Activities and prices are based on those for individual tuition.
Snowshoeing is one of the many traditions, still cultivated in Adelboden. Discover peaceful and secluded corners, far away from the crowds.

Immerse yourself in a world of icicles. What could be cooler than a frozen waterfall? Ice climbing, the fascinating sport in the world of waterfalls and icicles. Here we show you how to move safely in the ice.
Please remain seated. In Adelboden, sledge runners are certainly a match for skis. Dozens of miles of trails carry riders through forests and over icing-sugar-coated meadows.

At the moment, we offer Halfboard only on request.
At the moment, we offer Banquets only on request.
Your Review please tell us more
Describe your stay. We're all ears!
Your review has been registered and will be checked before publication.

We are always happy to receive your feedback, suggestions, and constructive criticism. You're welcome to share your observations with us directly on site or on our website. We strive to improve our services constantly, your comments allow us to accomplish this. We value your opinion and are looking forward to reading your suggestions!

trans-unit.note: titre pour écrire son propre review

trans-unit.source: Or feel free to review us on
Our Comfortable Double rooms feature a small terrace with a partial view on the mountains.
These rooms feature a balcony on the village side, with a view towards the Tschentenalp.
These rooms feature a balcony towards the east, partially with a view on the mountains. They are also suitable for 3 persons with a sofa bed.

These rooms offer a splendid view of the Adelboden mountain panorama. From the balcony you can enjoy the panoramic view spanning from the Bunderspitz passing over the Lohner mountain to the Wildstubel and Engstligen Falls.

These rooms are ideal for a family stay. They feature a gallery with a double bed, perfectly suited for 4 persons. The balcony is on the north side towards the village with a view towards the Tschentenalp.

These rooms are ideal for a family stay. They feature a gallery with a double bed, perfectly suited for 4 persons. From the balcony you can enjoy the panoramic view spanning from the Bunderspitz passing over the Lohner mountain to the Wildstubel and Engstligen Falls.

We are a highly motivated international team looking forward to offer you an exceptional stay in our hotel and restaurant. We're happy to share a good moment with our guests, therefore we put our best effort daily to make each moment count for you. We're looking forward to meet you soon!
Choose the plan that fits your needs.
* Terms apply, contact us for more information
Going on a holiday? No problem, you can take a break from our gym for free (annual subscriptions, 7 to 90 days per year) *
Special discount with the Adelboden Guest Card, CHF 15 instead of CHF 20 per entry.
Refer a friend and get a free month for each new subscriber! *

Enjoy different offerings in our small wellness oasis. Our Spa includes a Traditional Sauna, a Sanarium, a Steam Bath, an Infrared Cabin as well as a big relaxation room with a splendid panoramic view.
Relax your body and mind in our homely wooden barrel sauna, situated in our garden. After a short dive in the cold water pool or a cold shower, you can enjoy the calm in the adjacent relaxation room.
Book a soothing massage and let our masseurs and masseuses pamper you. Please book in advance, so that we can make the necessary arrangements.
In the spacious relaxation room you can relax, read a book or enjoy the view of the wonderful Adelboden mountain panorama.
